titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 789) censuring Representative Paul Gosar.
Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 789) censuring Representative Paul Gosar.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-174, by Ms. Scanlon.
The resoluton provides that the amendment printed in this report shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 45.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 795.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 207 (Roll no. 377).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 208 (Roll no. 378).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for consideration of H.Res. 789 (censuring Representative Paul Gosar).
